entry.title: iamkanishka/NativeThreads: Threads Clone is a modern social networking mobile app built with NativeScript Angular, designed for real-time interactions, seamless user experience, and smooth animations. Users can create threads, engage with comments and likes, receive real-time notifications, and share media—all in a lightweight and native mobile experience. 🚀
entry.content: Threads Clone is a modern social networking mobile app built with NativeScript Angular, designed for real-time interactions, seamless user experience, and smooth animations. Users can create threads, engage with comments and likes, receive real-time notifications, and share media—all in a lightweight and native mobile experience. 🚀
